items.name: Ironclad Plate
items.effect: Warrior permanently takes 25 less damage from melee attacks.

items.name: Berserker Helm
items.effect: When Warrior drops below 50% HP, gain +40 attack for the rest of the run.

items.name: Blood Oath
items.effect: Sacrifice 25 HP at the start of this level to gain +60 attack for the rest of the level.

items.name: Warcry Horn
items.effect: All allies gain +25 attack for the next 2 turns.

items.name: Battle Standard
items.effect: At the start of this level, all allies adjacent to the Warrior gain +25 defense for the entire level.

items.name: Golden Crown
items.effect: At the end of each battle, gain +20% extra Glyphs if the King took no damage.

items.name: Royal Vault
items.effect: All Glyphs earned during this run are preserved if the run ends in defeat.

items.name: Last Stand Banner
items.effect: If the King takes damage this level, negate the first 50 damage and prevent Glyph loss. Consumed after this level.

items.name: Royal Command
items.effect: Reposition one ally to any adjacent tile and heal them for 25 HP.

items.name: Divine Right
items.effect: At the start of each battle this run, the King heals 25 HP.
